message:
My speech at Global Ayurveda Festival, Kozhikode was on importance & relevance of Ayurveda & how it has solutions to many health problems. Spoke on steps Govt is taking to popularise Ayurveda & traditional systems of medicines, key to our vision of providing holistic healthcare.

When it comes to Ayurveda, its vital to address issues of safety, quality, efficacy & keep pace with emerging trends 
http://nm-4.com/zx5e
